channel.title: Will rep for help
channel.description:
when i have my server and client both running and go to log into my server and it starts to log me in then it kicks me out and the client cmd shell gives me this error
"error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection"
if you can help me ill rep you.

item.title: Will rep for help
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

i am having the same problem um… i was able to log on with the same client on the source but now it’s says that error.

Read full topic

item.title: Will rep for help
item.dc:creator: @Gilior Gilior
item.description:
@Gilior wrote:

Your not allowed to request help for Rep++.

Also, it looks like you are disconnecting because the client is loading something from the client it doesn’t recognize. Such as graphics or models.

Read full topic

item.title: Will rep for help
item.dc:creator: @WAFFLE2 WAFFLE-
item.description:
@WAFFLE2 wrote:

Your client doesnt connect to that server. thats just like u running a 317 client on a 562…

Read full topic
